data.title: SMPL NGLSH
data.solution:
string = gets.chomp
strng = string.upcase.tr("AEIOU", "")
puts strng
data.statement:
<<SMPL NGLSH>> (Simple English) is simple:

<<1.>> Convert all letters to UPPERCASE.
<<2.>> Remove all vowels: {{AEIOU}}

testCases.title: Test 4
testCases.testIn: Um, OK, I don't see why this language is necessary? What kind of bizzare, basic pseudo-encryption do you call this? 0 out of 10.
testCases.testOut: M, K,  DN'T S WHY THS LNGG S NCSSRY? WHT KND F BZZR, BSC PSD-NCRYPTN D Y CLL THS? 0 T F 10.

testCases.title: Validator 4
testCases.testIn: Use this and you can't even discern you from eye or ay. Really, why would I rely on something so unreliable? 0.5 out of 5
testCases.testOut: S THS ND Y CN'T VN DSCRN Y FRM Y R Y. RLLY, WHY WLD  RLY N SMTHNG S NRLBL? 0.5 T F 5

testCases.title: Test 5
testCases.testIn: One Piece is the best manga for anyone who believes in liberation and hates abuse of authority. Monkey D. Luffy is a character who personifies these ideals and always backs his ideals up with action.
testCases.testOut: N PC S TH BST MNG FR NYN WH BLVS N LBRTN ND HTS BS F THRTY. MNKY D. LFFY S  CHRCTR WH PRSNFS THS DLS ND LWYS BCKS HS DLS P WTH CTN.

testCases.title: Validator 5
testCases.testIn: One Piece is peak-fiction. There's no comparable epic for a single author in history. Over 1000 chapters of drawn story, while maintaining a story so engaging that its global impact continues to climb.
testCases.testOut: N PC S PK-FCTN. THR'S N CMPRBL PC FR  SNGL THR N HSTRY. VR 1000 CHPTRS F DRWN STRY, WHL MNTNNG  STRY S NGGNG THT TS GLBL MPCT CNTNS T CLMB.

data.stubGenerator:
read string:string(250)
write STRNG

STATEMENT
SMPL NGLSH
data.inputDescription: <<1 line :>> a [[string]] to be converted into <<SMPL NGLSH>>
data.outputDescription: <<1 line :>> the string converted into <<SMPL NGLSH>>

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

SMPL NGLSH (Simple English) is simple:

1. Convert all letters to UPPERCASE.
2. Remove all vowels: AEIOU
Input
1 line : a string to be converted into SMPL NGLSH
Output
1 line : the string converted into SMPL NGLSH
Constraints
0 < length(string) < 250
string is composed of these characters A-Za-z0-9 '.,?!-
The output is never an empty string.
Example
Input
english
Output
NGLSH
